origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'GEAPI.analyze_technology_application', 'description': 'This function analyzes the application of specified technologies in the given supply chain data.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'data', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The supply chain data to be analyzed.'}, {'name': 'technologies', 'type': 'LIST', 'description': 'A list of technologies to analyze, e.g., IoT, smart_warehousing.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'analysis_result', 'description': 'The analysis results of the specified technologies in the supply chain data.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 GEAPI.analyze_technology_application, 它的参数输入如下: 'data'是'supply_chain_data', 'technologies'是['IoT', 'smart_warehousing'].
